review: This device operates as I does not fit my TV. It is just a little too long to work with my Samsung Smart TV (UN60F8000BFXZ) without using the HDMI extension cable. The HDMI inputs on this television are set into a depressed well on the back of the TV. The length of the Fire TV Stick is such that it will not fit completely into the well, causing it to be angled upward at the tail, and therefore cannot be slipped into the HDMI port.There is an HDMI extension included in the box, but using it just adds to the clutter behind the TV. The device itself does not fit, completely negating the "just plug and play" advertising.

review: Like it so far, still need to use it more to decide if I want to love it. A definite plus though: seeing the lyrics to songs on screen when playing music through Amazon player. They don't appear for all of the songs, but I've seen them pop up for the more popular ones (even in Spanish!). It's like having a mini karaoke machine at home. One minus I've found so far, the screensaver appears only if you're on the home screen. If you remain on an app (like Netflix), you will continue to see the netflix sign in page. Not exactly ideal. The screensaver should appear regardless.
author: The Z-Meister
